website_summaries.verdict: This multi-purpose tool is a great option for those looking for a premium peeler that's lightweight and easy to use.
pros: Highly functional countered design makes it incredibly easy to operate
Very durable, but it's backed by a 10-year warranty just in case
Can be used both by lefties and righties
Will not plug up, unlike some of the other peelers
cons: Not quite as versatile as other 2-for-1 peelers

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I peel a lot of ginger for ginger ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I peel a lot of ginger for ginger ale and I used to have a peeler with a stabilizing arm across the back of the blade. All my peelings would get stuck back there and then wrap around the front of the blade. I would have to stop and clean it out all the time. Why put up with crappy equipment? This peeler makes really thin peels and never plugs up. It will peel as well on the pull-stroke as the push-stroke and will really fling the peel on the push-stroke. This peeler has a sharp blade. Couln't find any better.
customer_reviews.author: ep444dakota

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found My Peeler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this peeler even after only trying on one carrot really quickly. I avoided trying the other Linden Sweden peeler here on Amazon after seeing some negative feedback and decided to try this one only after seeing a review that said it was a better version. I am glad I did because everything else I have tried has been sub par. It peels with zero effort while making super thin strips and circles nicely for coring eyes. The fact that it performed so wonderfully on a carrot means that it will breeze through a potato with no problem. I will update this review later once I have used it for several preps. Picture very related.
customer_reviews.author: Dideric

customer_reviews.title: Best vegetable peeler ever
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but this is the best vegetable peeler I ever used. I also bought Linden peeler with the metal handle and this one is ten times the better peeler. Easy to peel vegetable and remove only a thin layer of the peel. The only problem was the blade is too sharp: I was used to the using the point of my old peeler to remove dimples and other defects, but when I tried that with the Linden peeler, the blade filleted the skin off the joint of my index finger. BE CAREFUL.
customer_reviews.author: JTF

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable.  Very Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned quite a few vegetable peelers in my lifetime, but I've never had one as comfortable to use as this one. I almost want to go out and buy some more potatoes! I can't comment on longevity since I haven't owned this peeler very long, but I see no reason why it shouldn't last for years. A very good purchase. Update: 7/28/18 - I’ve been using this peeler for over a year now. It has gotten a lot of use and it still looks new and seems as sharp as the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: SankaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler!
customer_reviews.text: I used to think Pampered Chef peelers were the best. Until I tried this for the first time tonight on potatoes. This is the best!! My pet peeve with most potato peelers is when the skin gets stuck in the blade and you have to stop to remove it because it won't peel until you do. Not the case with this peeler! No peels got stuck and my potatoes were peeled lickety split!!
customer_reviews.author: suzyq86401

customer_reviews.title: Similar style as my old one, love this one.
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those people that had the old style of this peeler that had a metal handle. My old one broke and I saw I could buy one just like it, but my husband did not like the old one and said it was uncomfortable to hold. I came upon this one, and immediately decided this would work for me and my husband. I really love it. It is sharp and easy to hold. I am very happy that the peeler end is the same as my old one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Camomile

customer_reviews.title: great and sharp
customer_reviews.text: i have a Kyocera y shaped ceramic peeler that i really like. however, the shape of it made it difficult to peel things like potatoes, but it was fine for carrots. i wanted something more traditional so i purchased this one (got an amazon warehouse deal to save a few bucks). it's great. i don't have to scrunch my hand up awkwardly to hold a potato (otherwise i'd cut a nail) like on the y peeler. it does get bogged down just a tiny bit with the peels sometimes but i prefer it over the y peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Linden Sweden
customer_reviews.text: With all the new fangled peelers out there today, there's nothing better than an old fashioned, sharp as get out, peeler with a great comfortable handle grip.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Sharp. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Sharp. Perfect. I got so tired of using inferior (but more expensive) peelers with an arch over the blade. Who thought it was a good idea to snag your peels on a useless piece of frame? Sadly, I've never seen this in a local store. Thank you, Jeff Bezos, for making it possible for us to find a product that gets it right in every way.
customer_reviews.author: RoadTechBNA

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 31 days.
customer_reviews.text: Blade cracked at the joint and it fell apart a day after the return period ended, so initial feedback is negative. Seller has actually contacted me offered refund/replacement. Will update review based on replacement results.
customer_reviews.author: IE

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this peeler to replace the peeler I misplaced that I took with me from my grandmother's house when I moved out many years ago. So far it has worked excellent on everything I have used it on. Just as good as the original. I know it doesn't happen often but if someone told me they were looking to buy a hand peeler I would recommend this 💯. Made in Sweden.
customer_reviews.author: mary p.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, smooth peeling with the Grip version, very happy with this ☺️
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the original Linden peeler without the grip handle by mistake. Later on, I purchased the grip handle version and Wow, it peels wonderfully!! It's smooth and efficient, but I'm confused as to why the Grip version is so superior in peeling than the original version. The two are both good, but I would definitely recommend buying ONLY the Grip version. You will absolutely love it. I'm not sure how long the blades remain sharp. I guess that depends on your use, but I'm guess they're good for a few years at least. The price is reasonable, so you can always replace them if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SocalDancer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and swivels nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Great peeler. So sharp and easily swivels. I thought I had a good peeler before, but since I lost that one and then tried this, there’s no mourning the loss of my 30 year old peeler. Highly recommend. I’m buying one for each of my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vegetable peeler i have ever used. Easy and comfortable to hold, i don't have to press down to get it to cut and it takes a nice thin slice so I'm not wasting half the vegetable in peelings. The blade stays stationary rather than rattling in the handle so it's ready for the next stroke without waiting for it to adjust again. Already purchased two more for Christmas presents for my boys!
customer_reviews.author: JLar

customer_reviews.title: so far so good..
customer_reviews.text: I have found "Modern" peelers to be very ergo-appearing and at first look a 'better' design, but they all either fail in their function (i.e. they are lousy at peeling vegetables) or they just fail (I just broke my second Oxo peeling a butternut squash). This one is a classic design, significantly improved by removing the 'shroud' around the blade that captures the peels (on the traditional device). As far as failure...so far so good...I will update this review if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Reversible?
customer_reviews.text: The blade isn’t fixed, meaning it can spin 360 degrees for left and right-handed use. What this ends up doing is flipping the blade upside down every few slices. It’s a shame because the blade itself is really sharp, but after a few pounds of potatoes, this peeler was ready for the garbage can. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erick F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler Ever
customer_reviews.text: Makes peeling potatoes, etc. a breeze. By and large the best peeler I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I can peel anything
customer_reviews.text: Have had these peelers for 6+ months. Potatoes, Carrots, HARD-SKINNED winter squash -- all peeled beautifully, even after the peeler went through the dishwasher multiple times. I originally bought two --- they have not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Robynn Brannen

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vegetable peeler I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Look no further this is the peeler for you after returning three other pillars on Amazon I found the one that works left-handed right-handed peeling away from you peeling towards you look no further
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly Cheap Handle
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed to open this peeler and see how cheap the plastic "soft grip" handle was. I wouldn't say there is any softness or cushion to it, just flimsy, cheap plastic. Really bummed because I would love to find a high-end peeler that I felt was going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. This is the best peeler we've ever used. Even if your produce is washed ahead of time, this peer still works smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I never leave reviews, but...
customer_reviews.text: So at first I was taken aback --- I ordered the "soft grip" handle peeler and that is NOT what I received. This peeler is all metal. But then I tried peeling some carrots and istg it worked like magic. With my old peeler (which DOES has a soft handle) I was used to exerting a good bit of pressure when peeling. With this new peeler, it's like the blade barely touches the vegetable and there's a fine strip of peel ribboning off into the sink. Amazing! I'm not missing the soft grip handle at all because the peeling action is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new peeler for our camper and figured based on the reviews, this would work for the limited time we use it in the camper. When it came in the mail, we started to use it to make sure we didn't need to keep looking...let me tell you this might be our main peeler at home now and put the one we had at the house in the camper. As long as it holds up, very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like mom's, only better
customer_reviews.text: After having to toss several peelers, I saw that the old fashioned kind my mother used to use (we're talking 1940s) was still available from the original company. And here it is. I ordered the one with the comfortable handle and am delighted with the whole thing. The blade section swivels slightly, just enough to make peeling a bit easier. The new design of handle makes the old reliable peeler more comfortable. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: DeidreS

customer_reviews.title: The best peeler
customer_reviews.text: My family had a really old vegetable peeler for a very long time. It was amazing. We lost it a few years ago and have yet to find a peeler to match the quality job done by our old peeler. Enter this vegetable peeler. Game changer. It's so smooth and works perfectly. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing peeler!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricier than other peelers, but this is worth every cent. It glides through the skin of whatever you're cutting without any of the snags or stops from cheap peelers. This is one of those instances where buying the good tool once is better than buying cheaper, cruddier tools 2 or 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Skruffy Nerfherder

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler
customer_reviews.text: The blade is insane sharp. Don’t inquire how I know “first hand”, well you may be able to put your “finger” on it now. The grip seems a bit like cheap rubber with seams that protrude out a tiny bit (like from the injection molding) But the shape of the grip is spot on and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this and thought is was a bit pricey, but it works great! I would buy again and again. Far better than the ones you can buy at big box stores. This one actually cuts!
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: My go-to peeler.
customer_reviews.text: Used almost daily, I don't know how you could improve on the design and function of this simple kitchen tool. Have owned many potato peelers but this is the last one I will ever need unless I lose it of course.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and exactly style I wanted, but handle larger than preferred. Going to try the non-soft handle.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Peeler old school
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an old-fashioned type and inexpensive peeler like this one. After reading the reviews and finding out it’s made in another country other than... I had to try it. It’s better in quality and feels good in the hand. Does a good job for fruits and vegetables that can be peeled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent peeler
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, comfortable, effective, and easy to use. Made in Sweden - check package since other reviews report made in China.. the one I received is clearly marked Sweden.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, razor sharp
customer_reviews.text: As good as our 30-year-old no-name Swedish peeler which somehow ended up getting lost or tossed into the trash. We tried a knock-off version from our local hardware store and it cost almost as much as this Linden beauty and was a worthless piece of junk. The Linden is easy to hold, has just the right angle on the sharp edge, and makes peeling apples and potatoes easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Maven

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like butter
customer_reviews.text: I have had a peeler similar to this one that has lasted me 20 years. I've tried other peelers but they take off too much of the meat or plain butchered my veggies. Not this peeler! It makes such this and precise cuts and I barely have to use pressure. Fits well in my hand and gets the job done effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this peeler so far. Replaced my OXO peeler. So glad I decided to try something different! Hope it stays sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Teton Mom

customer_reviews.title: Peeler
customer_reviews.text: Husband said the peeler is some much better than the last three he has bought. Bonus not made in China
customer_reviews.author: ctree@texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly engineered. Very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best peeler I have ever used. It takes off just the right amount. Game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny

customer_reviews.title: tarnishes when put in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I use this on fruit and veggies. The peeler is very easy to use but it does tarnish when put into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Texas pet mom

customer_reviews.title: Not made in China
customer_reviews.text: This peeler is sturdy and easy to handle. My mother had one years ago and was misplaced during a move so I was happy to find this solidly made peeler
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate lover

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best peeler I’ve had in a long time. Easy and smooth to use. I lost my first one and bought a replacement because I missed it so much. Simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Chanson Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect tool.... Worth every penny. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eve McLain - Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Xtra thick slices
customer_reviews.text: This is for thick slices. If you want fine slices like I do this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler
customer_reviews.text: Great peeler!, better than chinese ones!, this is realy sharp and realy peel and doesn't get stucked...
customer_reviews.author: JUAN CARLOS VAZQUEZ RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sharp! You could easily take some of your skin off it your not careful! Bought a second one for my cabin. This makes peeling potatoes, carrots, apples so easy!
customer_reviews.author: CASRN

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It has nice sharp edges and works easily, unlike many others. I peeled apples.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Makes quick work of it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit ugly but everything else is great and that’s what matters. It’s comfortable, sharp and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reasoner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Who knew a peeler could be so great! Bought one, then bought another for my mom. Sharp and effective, watch fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Emma C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! It is the best peeler that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It is the best peeler that I have had in many years and is very quick and easy as compared to several that I have had over that period.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Klabbers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and NOT made in China so it’s a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the same peeler for 40 years and was so disappointed when I lost it, but this replacement is so amazing. I should have ordered this years ago. Sharp, ergonomic and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Moser

customer_reviews.title: Fits hand, beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: It fits a not-so-petite hand and is as sharp as it's needed to be so the jobs are done more quickly & less awkwardly.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Curious

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, very sharp, peels great. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Best one I have ever bought. Well made, sharp and easy to use. Doesn’t seem like it will ever rust either.
customer_reviews.author: Guenevere Mead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nostalgic peeler
customer_reviews.text: I got this peeler for my mother after she complained that all the "new fangled" peelers were not working like the "old" stuff. This design is perfect and she's able to use it with the arthritis in her hands.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Tee

customer_reviews.title: Groovy purple handle!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn’t realize how dull my peeler was until I tried this one. So glad I ordered this, probably have to get a second one! The groovy purple handle makes it easy to find in a sea of stainless steel handles so I’m totally jiggy with the color!!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work okay. The handle is comfortable. Blade seems sharp. It works good on carrots, however the potatoes weren't as easy to do. I've been using the y shaped peeler for several years now, so I may just have to re-learn the swivel peeler. I like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler i've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Peeler was very sharp and comfortable to use. It took half the effort as my old one. Use for carrots and potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dmeyer

customer_reviews.title: It's not bulky and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight slender design that was easy to hold and that's what I got. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: This product is easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The design makes it easy to clean. Works great and is easy to hold. I will be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler ever
customer_reviews.text: Peeling potatoes from russet to sweet this peeler is smooth as can be. No pressure needed for the peeler to work. Skin comes off effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Bull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but is very sharp so be careful when first using it. Not for kids to use!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: My go to fruit peeler
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to peel fruits with a knife and I have depended on a peeler since I was young. Most are too large to use to peel fruits like applies but this one is thin enough without getting in the way and peels my apple nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler
customer_reviews.text: Never been so excited about a peeler! Works great and used to dread peeling but now I look forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect peeler
customer_reviews.text: The ones I had were horrible but this makes me want to peel potatoes again
customer_reviews.author: Terry Voorhees

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler
customer_reviews.text: Best peeler! Have tried so many....happy I finally found my go to peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Teags

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler
customer_reviews.text: The blade is great, glides through anything, but the handle is a tad bit wide for my small hands. I enjoy using it anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniya Raytseva

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and ergonomic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this peeler! Thing is sharp as razors and makes peeling potatoes and fruit like running a hot knife through butter! Real quality piece!
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Cracked steel
customer_reviews.text: How can steel cracked? I used it for about 9 months? It is not even daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this peeler! I didn’t know how dull my old one had become until I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: CRGH

customer_reviews.title: The best peeler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this peeler! I have searched long and hard to replace a peeler I had that was very similar to this one. I'm so happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler! Never jams up
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blades and no bar over the top of the cutter to jam with peelings. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best potato peeler I've ever owned. Works great. I like the plastic cover over the metal. Easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: rac

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a Dream!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream!! My Pampered Chef peeler went missing, I tried their new one and hated it. I came across this one on Amazon and it's better than my old Pampered Chef peeler. It's sharp and cuts beautifully!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler ever!
customer_reviews.text: This peeler has the best shape to fit perfectly in your hand. It also works without making a sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great but
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 4 months before the bracket to hold blade, broke off.
customer_reviews.author: D Elliott

customer_reviews.title: BEST PEELER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: BEST PEELER EVER! I love the purple handle, it is so light and more comfortable to use. Designed with perfection in everyway!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazingly Joyous

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice to hold and it peels so easy! Very sharp
customer_reviews.author: GrannyP

customer_reviews.title: This peeler works amazing. The shape of it makes it super easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This peeler works amazing. The shape of it makes it super easy to use and the price is great as well. Definitely would recommend to my friends and will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Liesl

customer_reviews.title: smoothest peeler I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This fairly-priced peeler works very smoothly and it's holding up well. After peeling at least 100 potatoes, it's still working as well as the first day.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best peeler I have ever used. Sharp and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Buy

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small hand so not as comfortable as my old one. However, I am overlooking that since it peels terrific. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: I have bought many peelers that looked exactly the same but they weren't sharp to start with or got dull very fast
customer_reviews.text: I had an old time peeler that continues to be sharp as a razor. I have bought many peelers that looked exactly the same but they weren't sharp to start with or got dull very fast. I have used the Linden Sweden for about a month, and it is razor sharp. It looks like a twin of my old time peeler except for the handle. I will be ordering another one for a future backup, but I think I might just get the regular handle one.
customer_reviews.author: Ceil

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with it and glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to the price but bought it anyway. I'm very pleased with it and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: mfetgatterTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Just like my "old" pampered chef peeler
customer_reviews.text: Finally have a peeler that works easily and smoothly like the older version of the Pampered Chef peeler.

customer_reviews.title: I NEEDED A NEW PEELER
customer_reviews.text: I SAW PURPLE IN THE HANDLE TO ADD TO ALL MY OTHER KITCHEN ITEMS,, MOST OF ALL WHEN I USED IT TURNED TO BE BY FAR THE BEST PEELER I HAVE EVER USED..
customer_reviews.author: leslie r. hall

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found to replace the old one that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a second, so that I have one for camping, too. Best I have found to replace the old one that was over 20 years old.
customer_reviews.author: NHsnowpup

customer_reviews.title: Best Veggie peeler EVER
customer_reviews.text: After 40 years of using substandard peelers, I bought this one.. It's the BEST EVER!!! I give it a 5 star rating all around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, no frills-it just works
customer_reviews.author: Jay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grip, every stroke effortlessly removes apple peelings. Do yourself a favor....buy this and waste no more money on expensive and useless units.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp and doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered two of them. Unfortunately, the blades were not sharp. Too dull to peel potatoes. I’ve returned the two I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Hmonster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent I bought many brands doesn’t work today I order another one Incase I can’t use any brand the products was so perfect
customer_reviews.author: molly lim chao

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and slices so easily!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY slices! Love it! Best one I've ever purchased for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp. I can peel cucumbers and not peel away everything.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The plastic at the bottom that holds the blade piece in place broke on the third use. I got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very sharp which is good and can be bad if you miss!
customer_reviews.author: Wanderso

customer_reviews.title: (thought I) Finally found a decent one!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Works consistently. Easy to use, no frills. Revised - duller than dull after less than 2 years of only occasional use
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than 3 months and fell apart. Was good while it lasted I suppose.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: As simple as this peeler is, nothing else compares. I liked it so much, I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: mac1660_0

customer_reviews.title: Like butter.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived the very next day I placed the order. The rubber handle makes this tool easier to hold. The job of peeling potatoes was fast and efficient. Like butter. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ChillySea

customer_reviews.title: OMG FINALLY A GOOD PEELER
customer_reviews.text: Finally a potato peeler thats NOT junk! Very sharp, seems to be good quality.I used on potatos

product_meta.title: Linden Sweden Fruit and Vegetable Peeler – Made In Sweden- Great for Apples, Carrots and Potatoes - Soft-Grip Handle for Comfort and Safety - Dishwasher Safe - Stainless Steel Construction (Gray)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black/Gray

Who Says Meal Prep Has to Be a Chore?

Apple pie, potato soup and other comfort foods are undeniably delicious – but they also require a 
lot of prep work. Attempting to peel produce with a knife is both dangerous and ineffective, while 
electric peelers are far from reliable.

Fast, efficient and a classic kitchen staple, the Fruit and Vegetable Peeler by Linden Sweden makes 
food prep easier than ever! The secret is in our razor-sharp blades, which are designed to resist 
dulling, even with daily use. From tough squash to delicate cucumbers, you’ll quickly remove 
peels as the precision ground swivel glides along curves and bumps.

Our versatile design accommodates both right and left-handed users, offering total control while 
you peel! Paired with a soft-grip handle, there’s no cramping or discomfort. When you’re done, 
just pop it in the dishwasher for a cleanup that’s truly convenient. At 6.5” in length, it takes up 
minimal space to help maximize your kitchen’s organization!

Millions of customers have trusted the Jonas peeler for nearly 6 decades! That’s all thanks to high 
quality materials like durable plastic and 18/10 stainless steel. Your peeler will remain sharp for 
years to come, delivering both durability and reliability.

Why Choose Our Vegetable Peeler?

- Great for fruits and vegetables
- Soft-grip handle for comfort
- Safe in the dishwasher
- Easy to use and store
- Made with 18/10 stainless steel


Try Today Risk Free with Our 10-Year No-Rust Guarantee!

*Stock is limited. Order today to ensure availability.

Order Your Peeler Now for Fast, Easy Meal Prep!
feature_bullets: Peel with Ease: Save time and make your meal prep a breeze with our easy-to-use fruit peeler! Great for both right and left-handed users, the razor-sharp blades effortlessly slice through peels while precision ground swivel tackles produce of any shape or size.

Comfort Meets Safety: Designed with an ergonomic, soft-grip handle, our carrot peeler allows you to work for hours without hand cramping or discomfort! With a secure hold, you’re in complete control of the cooking tool, maximizing your safety and confidence.

Easy to Clean: Safe in the dishwasher, our kitchen peeler eliminates the hassle of your post-meal cleanup! And because it measures just 6.5” in length, you can slip it into any drawer for simple organization and quick storage that doesn’t sacrifice valuable space.

Stainless Steel Construction: Great kitchen products start with great materials! 18/10 stainless steel ensures our blades remain super-sharp for years to come. Paired with the durability of our plastic handles, we provide the quality cooks have trusted for decades.

No-Rust Guarantee: For 58 years, the Jonas peeler has stood alongside the industry’s most popular cooking supplies! In fact, each order includes our 10-year guarantee that the steel blades won’t rust. If you have any issues, let our customer service team know.
